fetch: SELECT  v.name, io_open.rack AS open_rack, io_open.db AS open_db, io_open.address AS open_addr, io_closed.rack AS closed_rack, io_closed.db AS closed_db, io_closed.address AS closed_addr FROM valves v JOIN io io_open ON io_open.id = v.open_feedback JOIN io io_closed ON io_closed.id = v.closed_feedback;
